intent_atoms.description: Configure automated performance benchmarks for large MP4 analyses to capture CLI and app throughput.
Benchmarks execute representative large-file scenarios for CLI streaming validation and UI event propagation, recording latency, throughput, and memory use.
Baseline thresholds derived from initial runs are encoded so CI fails when regressions exceed agreed tolerances.
Documentation updates summarize benchmark scenarios, metrics captured, and instructions for reproducing measurements locally.
Non-functional requirements mandate sub-45-second CLI validation for 4 GB reference files and <200 ms UI update latency.
Leverage existing streaming fixtures or generate synthetic large files guided by Research Task R4 recommendations.
Integrate XCTest Metrics and signpost instrumentation to capture CPU time, wall-clock latency, and memory for both CLI commands and UI pipelines.
Provide configuration hooks (e.g., environment variables) to toggle benchmark intensity to keep default CI runtime manageable while enabling deeper local profiling when needed.

functional_units.name: Large-File Performance Benchmark Suite
functional_units.description: Automated tests that measure CLI and UI throughput for large MP4 analyses, capturing latency, throughput, and memory usage.

functional_units.name: CLI Streaming Validation Benchmark
functional_units.description: Executes representative large-file scenarios via command-line interface to validate streaming performance against sub‑45‑second thresholds.

functional_units.name: UI Event Propagation Benchmark
functional_units.description: Runs large-file scenarios in the application UI to measure event propagation latency (<200 ms) and throughput.

functional_units.name: Benchmark Configuration Hooks
functional_units.description: Environment variable or other configuration options that toggle benchmark intensity, allowing default CI runtime to remain manageable while enabling deeper local profiling.

functional_units.name: Baseline Threshold Encoder
functional_units.description: Stores derived baseline metrics so that CI fails when regressions exceed agreed tolerances.

functional_units.name: Synthetic Large-File Generator
functional_units.description: Tool for generating synthetic 4 GB MP4 files guided by research task recommendations, used as test assets when existing fixtures are insufficient.

functional_units.name: XCTest Metrics Integration
functional_units.description: Instrumentation using XCTest Metrics to capture CPU time and wall‑clock latency for both CLI commands and UI pipelines.

functional_units.name: Signpost Instrumentation Module
functional_units.description: Adds signpost logging to record detailed performance data during benchmark runs.

functional_units.name: Benchmark Documentation Generator
functional_units.description: Produces documentation summarizing benchmark scenarios, captured metrics, and instructions for reproducing measurements locally.
